commit.message:
Auto merge of #96261 - petrochenkov:doclink7, r=GuillaumeGomez

rustdoc: Resolve some more doc links early

Trying another subset of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94857 that is not too expensive.

                         resolver,
+                        sess,
